{{Infobox_Radio_station | name = DWQW (Campus Radio Naga) | image = [[File:Naga 101.5 (DWQW).jpg]] | city = [[Naga City, Camarines Sur|Naga City]] | area = [[Bicol Region]] | branding = Campus Radio 101.5 FM | slogan = Ayos! | airdate = September, 1998 | frequency = 101.5 MHz | format = Pop Music, OPM Hits, CHR | power = 10,000 [[watt]]s | erp = | class = B+CDE | callsign_meaning = DWQW | owner = [[GMA Network]], Inc. | website = [http://www.1015campusradio.110mb.com Campus Radio Naga] }}
'''Campus Radio 101.5 FM''' (101.5 MHz [[Naga City, Camarines Sur|Naga City]]) is a [[FM broadcasting|FM]] station of [[GMA Network, Inc. ]] in Naga City, . The station's [[studio]] is located at the 4/F DMG Bldg., PeÃ±afrancia Ave., Naga City and [[transmitter]] located at GMA TV Relay Station located at Roxas Avenue, Naga City. The Naga City station airs hits that are current ballad, R&B, OPM and rock in genre. This station is managed by Mr.Roberto De los Martirez, Sr. As of the present time, the station is strongly on the air, with the 10K power sweeping across Bicol Region reaching as far as the Province of Romblon, Sibuyan Island, parts of Catanduanes, Southern Quezon Province, most of Albay Province, Camarines Norte, Burias Island, and parts of main Masbate Island.
